project_name: Survey Management System - Správa dotazníků uživatelem/vlastníkem

core_functionality.admin_fe_environment: Application provides admin FE environment for survey management by business user/owner
core_functionality.structure_elements: Structure from known elements / sections / questions answers / control questions / sorting
core_functionality.version_management: Always new template version published / unpublished
core_functionality.version_invalidation: Ability to invalidate original versions - unification of version compatibility (impact vs non-impact change) into evaluation algorithm
core_functionality.version_deletion: Version deletion - Only through Deactivation option
core_functionality.access_control: Access through roles and access rights with AD integration
functional_modules: Client service - can be further propagated to other internal systems via FE iframe

strategic_context.market_positioning: Digital-first banking transformation with customer-centric feedback loop as competitive differentiator
regulatory_landscape: PCI DSS for payment card surveys
strategic_context.competitive_intelligence: Leading banks implementing real-time feedback systems show 25% improvement in customer retention
strategic_context.transformation_alignment: Core component of digital transformation strategy and customer experience excellence program

strategic_stakeholder_analysis.status: Expert Level analysis with C-suite and regulatory stakeholder mapping

strategic_problem_statement.status: Enterprise-level business case with competitive intelligence and regulatory framework

strategic_scope_definition.status: API-first architecture scope with partnership enablement and regulatory compliance

strategic_as_is_analysis.status: Pre-digital architecture assessment with strategic risk evaluation and transformation baseline
